TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CustomStopWordsRemovingTransformer extends Microsoft.ML.Data.OneToOneTransformerBase
Public NotInheritable Class CustomStopWordsRemovingTransformer Inherits OneToOneTransformerBase

Docs.summary: Custom stopword remover removes specified list of stop words. This is usually applied after tokenizing text, so it compares individual tokens (case-insensitive comparison) to the stopwords.
